div.h1: Terms of Use and Online Privacy

div.p: The content of the REED collections on this website, including the glossaries and bibliography, is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License. This means that you may copy and redistribute the material in any medium or format, as well as remix, transform, and build upon the material, but only under the following terms: you may not use the material for commercial purposes, and you must distribute it under the same license as the original. You must also credit REED Online as the original source, provide a link to the license, and state whether any changes were made to the content.

To cite REED Online please include the website name REED Online and the URL of the website home page or, when relevant, the individual record, as well as the date of access. If you are citing an individual record, please also include the editor's name and name of the collection. For citing an individual record, using MLA 8, we recommend the following format:
Somerset, J. Alan B. (ed). "Staffordshire." REED Online, https://ereed.library.utoronto.ca/records/staff-ridm55010640/. Accessed 29 Mar. 2018.
The REED Online website and all content provided on it is protected by copyright and other applicable intellectual property and proprietary rights laws.
The name REED Online and the associated logos and may not be used without permission of the REED project.

We use data gathered by Google Analytics to ensure that the site is meeting your needs, and to see where there is room for improvement. All user data that we receive is completely anonymous. However, your domain name or IP address may identify you depending on the naming standards followed by your Internet service provider. You may wish to ask them about their policies and practices.
We use Google Analytics to track how you use this website, including information about:

li.p: How long you stay on the site
What search terms you use on the site
Which, and how many, pages you visit while you’re on the site
What page you’re on when you decide to leave the site

div.p: If you don’t want Google Analytics to record how you use our website, you can opt out by using this browser extension or setting your browser to private mode.
